Smart Umbrella: Develop an umbrella that can detect the weather forecast and adjust its shape and size accordingly. This umbrella would have a built-in weather sensor that can detect the humidity and temperature, allowing it to expand or contract to provide the optimal amount of protection from the elements.

Solar-Powered Umbrella: Create an umbrella that harnesses the power of the sun to charge your devices while you're on the go. This umbrella would have solar panels integrated into its canopy, allowing you to charge your phone, tablet, or other devices while you're protected from the rain.

Multi-Functional Umbrella: Develop an umbrella that can serve multiple purposes. For example, it could have a built-in flashlight, a pocket for storing small items like keys or a wallet, or even a built-in speaker for listening to music or taking hands-free calls.

Customizable Umbrella: Create an umbrella that allows users to customize the color, design, and size of the umbrella to suit their personal style. This could be achieved through a user-friendly app that allows users to upload their own designs or choose from a range of pre-designed options.

Air Purifying Umbrella: Develop an umbrella that can purify the air around you. This umbrella would have a built-in air purification system that can remove pollutants and allergens from the air, providing a healthier environment for you and those around you. The umbrella could also have a built-in fan to circulate the purified air and keep you cool on a hot day.
